assignJurors(uint256).details: Assign jurors once randomness is fulfilled

canAssignJurors(uint256).details: Check if jurors can be assigned (randomness fulfilled)

getAssignedJurors(uint256).details: Get assigned jurors for a dispute

getDisputeMetadata(uint256).details: Get dispute metadata for Thirdweb dashboard

getDisputeSummary(uint256).details: Get dispute summary for dashboard display

getDisputesByCreator(address).details: Get all disputes created by a specific address

returns.disputeIds: Array of dispute IDs created by the address

getQuantumOracleAddress().details: Get quantum oracle address for frontend integration

params.limit: Maximum number of disputes to return

getRegistryAddress().details: Get registry address for frontend integration

getVoteContractAddress().details: Get vote contract address for frontend integration

withdrawFees(uint256).details: Withdraw accumulated fees (only contract owner or DAO)
